column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////after hearing that pizza takes 30-40 minutes to cook
column2: we started with the house salad with red wine vinaigrette dressing which was lovely
column3: although a tad too sweet.  a small sized "malnati's" pizza was more than enough to feed 2 adults.  the infamous butter crust was not particularly buttery
column6: and the cheese was rubbery and hard
column8: the overall flavors exceeded my expectations.  the pizza was not oily nor salty
column9: but i don't think i could take more than 2 slices of it
column10: whereas i could devour the whole thing of pieology pizza.
